name: Furries of Infinity Land
description:
Something happened to Denya's friends! Furries from Infinity Land are going missing! You must find out what happened, and save them before it's to late!

You can Jump, Shoot, and Fly in this simple platformer game!

You must fined torches and light them to open the way forward!

There are obstacles and foes along the way, can you survive them all and save your friends?

* Note that the name doesn't match in game. Next update will fix that. *
